name: Velocity 2X
summary: Velocity 2X is a shoot 'em up video game developed by FuturLab and published by Sierra Entertainment for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, Xbox One and Microsoft Windows. The developers signed with Sony to create new titles for the PlayStation Vita in 2012, as a result of success of the first game.
